name: Patching and Handover to Bondek
template name: Patching and Handover to Bondek v2

name: Relevant Australian Standards Checked
AS4654.2-2012; Manufacturer’s Technical Data Sheet
Lapping/ sealing blockwork or concrete wall starter bars. Apply Enviro 700X.
Attach Photo. [MPX WITNESS POINT]
Check membrane - Check for damages to membrane.
Visual check. Attach Photo of damages. [POL HOLD POINT] / [MPX WITNESS POINT]
Patching. Apply Enviro HP1200 using a spray gun. Achieve 1.5mm DFT. Or Apply Enviro 700X.
Attach photo of patching. [MPX WITNESS POINT]
Lapping blockwalls or concrete walls. Apply Enviro HP1200 using a spray gun. Achieve 1.5mm DFT.
Attach Photo of lap to blockwork. [MPX WITNESS POINT]
Check for pinholes and other defects to membrane following patching & lapping to blockwalls and/or concrete walls.
Visual check. If pinholes found, run holiday test to check if membrane is compomised. [MPX WITNESS POINT]
Lapping/ sealing blockwork or concrete wall starter bars
Lapping blockwalls or concrete walls
Attach Photo of lap to blockwork. [MPX WITNESS POINT]
Testing. Flood test if applicable.
Attach photos of flood test. [MPX WITNESS POINT]
Final Inspection and Sign-off. Visually inspect and ensure adequately cured. Handover to Bondek. - DO NOT PASS UNTIL HOLDPOINT COMPLETE BELOW
HOLD POINT - CLICK HERE TO REQUEST BUILDER SIGN OFF
